thread.title: Czech Social Democrats ready to end government talks with PM Babis

title: Czech Social Democrats ready to end government talks with PM Babis
text:
April 5, 2018 / 9:07 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago Czech Social Democrats ready to end government talks with PM Babis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
PRAGUE (Reuters) - The Czech Social Democratic party (CSSD) is ready to walk away from government talks after Prime Minister Andrej Babisâ€™s ANO party rejected its proposals on forming a coalition, party leader Jan Hamacek said on Thursday. FILE PHOTO: Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis arrives at a news conference at government headquarters in Prague, Czech Republic, March 26, 2018. REUTERS/David W Cerny 
Hamacek told reporters he would recommend his party leadership vote to end talks with ANO when it meets on Friday. 
ANO was the clear winner in an election last October but lacks a majority and lost a confidence vote in parliament in January. Reporting by Robert Muller and Jason Hovet; editing by Andrew Roche
